Description: Sliver of oval handle of a pottery transport amphora. Clay coarse, micacecous, brown; mixed inclusions. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 122, 7. For comparanda from kiln sites in the Knidian peninsula see Cankardes-Senol 2016, 173, no. 4.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1566)
